alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Cove, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glen Cove, Huntington, Northport, Oyster Bay, Bayville, Centerport, Cold Spring Harbor, East Northport, Sea Cliff, Glen Head, Glenwood Landing, Lloyd Harbor, Locust Valley, East Norwich and Oyster Bay Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
